title: Ep: 024 - Talking Designer Rugs with Angela Adams
description: In this episode of Architecture, Design & Photography we sit down with Angela Adams, designer of handmade modern area rugs.  We begin the conversation with how she got started designing rugs and then delve into the creative process she goes through when thinking about designing a collection.
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
content:encoded: In this episode of Architecture, Design & Photography we sit down with Angela Adams, designer of handmade modern area rugs.  We begin the conversation with how she got started designing rugs and then delve into the creative process she goes through when thinking about designing a collection.
